com.mongo

Class MongoServiceProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mongo.MongoServiceProvider

  • public final class MongoServiceProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class that implements the various methods that are required by the UserServiceRouter. This class implements the following methods: getMongoServiceProvider, getAllUserDocuments, createUser, updateUser, getUserDocument and deleteUser.
    Author:
    Kamal Dandamudi on 8/25/16.

      private static java.lang.String usersCollectionName 

    • Constructor Summary

      private MongoServiceProvider()
      Private constructor to construct MongoServiceProvider and initialize the mongo client connection.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.util.Optional<org.bson.Document> checkUserExistence(java.lang.String userID)
      Internal method to check if a user with the passed in userID exists in the users collection of the database.

      Fetches the list of all Documents in the users collection of the database.

      Creates the singleton instance of the MongoServiceProvider class and returns it.

      Fetches the user document in the users collection of the database corresponding to the passed userID parameter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MongoServiceProvider

        private MongoServiceProvider()
        Private constructor to construct MongoServiceProvider and initialize the mongo client connection. This constructor is called from the static method getMongoServiceProvider.

    • Method Detail

      • checkUserExistence

        private java.util.Optional<org.bson.Document> checkUserExistence(java.lang.String userID)
        Internal method to check if a user with the passed in userID exists in the users collection of the database.
        Parameters:
        userID - String representing the id of the user to be checked for.
        Returns:
        Optional user document as the user may or may not exist. Would be empty if user does not exist or will contain the document corresponding to the user.

      • createUser

        public org.bson.Document createUser(java.lang.String userJSONString)
        Creates a new user document in the users collection if one does not already exist with the user's id passed in the JSON string. Uses private methods checkUserExistence to check if used with id exists.
        Parameters:
        userJSONString - JSON string representing the information of the user to be created.
        Returns:
        a Document with a Success code if user has been created or a Failure code if user already exists.

      • deleteUser

        public org.bson.Document deleteUser(java.lang.String userID)
        Deletes the matching user documents from the users collection. Uses private methods checkUserExistence to check if used with id exists.
        Parameters:
        userID - String representing the id of the user to be deleted.
        Returns:
        a Document with a Success code if user has been found and updated or a Failure code if user does not exist.

      • getAllUserDocuments

        public java.util.List<org.bson.Document> getAllUserDocuments()
        Fetches the list of all Documents in the users collection of the database.
        Returns:
        List of Document objects each representing a user.

      • getMongoServiceProvider

        public static MongoServiceProvider getMongoServiceProvider()
        Creates the singleton instance of the MongoServiceProvider class and returns it.
        Returns:
        singleton instance of the class.

      • getUserDocument

        public org.bson.Document getUserDocument(java.lang.String userID)
        Fetches the user document in the users collection of the database corresponding to the passed userID parameter. Uses private methods checkUserExistence to check if used with id exists.
        Parameters:
        userID - String representing the id of the user to be fetched.
        Returns:
        a Document with user information if user exists or a Documents with a Failure code.

      • updateUser

        public org.bson.Document updateUser(java.lang.String userJSONString)
        Fetches the user document in the users collection by matching the passed in user's id. If the user exists, updates the details passed in the JSON string. Uses private methods checkUserExistence to check if used with id exists.
        Parameters:
        userJSONString - JSON string representing the information of the user to be updated.
        Returns:
        a Document with a Success code if user has been found and updated or a Failure code if user does not exist.
